name.jp: 至尊のドラゴンマント

description.en: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.br: A Capa Dragão do Herói aumenta todos os atributos base em +8 e vida (HP) máxima em +400. O Selo do Dragão é exibido com destaque.
description.cns: 全属性+8和最大HP+400，强者的象征。
description.de: Der Heldenumhang des Drachen erhöht alle Statuswerte um +8 und deine Lebenspunkte um +400. Das Siegel des Drachen wird deutlich sichtbar angezeigt.
description.fi: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape du Dragon Invincible augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +8 et les Points de Vie de 400. Le sceau du dragon est bien en vue.
description.id: The Hero's Dragon Cloak meningkatkan all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon ditampilkan dengan jelas.
description.it: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 英雄のドラゴンマントは、すべてのステータスが+8、HP最大値が+400増加します。ドラゴンの紋章がより一層際立つ。
description.kr: 영웅의 드래곤 망토는 모든 기본 능력치를 +8, 최대 체력을 +400 만큼 증가시킵니다. 용의 인장이 눈에 띄게 표시됩니다.
description.nl: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Dragón del Héroe aumenta todas las estadísticas base en +8 y la HP Máxima en +400. El Sello del Dragón se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Hero's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.th: The Hero's Dragon Cloak เพิ่มสถานะพื้นฐานทั้งหมด +8 และ HP สูงสุด +400 ตราประทับของมังกรปรากฏอย่างเด่นชัด
description.tw: 至尊斗篷增加+8的基本屬性和最大HP+400。龍印顯現在斗篷上。
description.vi: Áo choàng rồng của Anh hùng tăng tất cả các chỉ số cơ bản lên +8 và HP tối đa thêm 400. Dấu ấn của Rồng được hiển thị nổi bật.
